definition: a turn made in skiing, remove the stem from
details:
noun
- a turn made in skiing
= synonyms: stem turn
- front part of a vessel or aircraft
= synonyms: fore, bow, prow
- cylinder forming a long narrow part of something
= synonyms: shank
- the tube of a tobacco pipe
- (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed
= example: (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed
= synonyms: radical, base, root, theme, root word
- a slender or elongated structure that supports a plant or fungus or a plant part or plant organ
= synonyms: stalk
verb
- remove the stem from
= example: remove the stem from
- stop the flow of a liquid
= synonyms: staunch, halt, stanch
- grow out of, have roots in, originate in
= example: grow out of, have roots in, originate in
- cause to point inward
= example: cause to point inward
